doc.previous: Einstein s equations predict that time should be altered by the presence of gravitational fields see the Schwarzschild metric  Einstein developed a geometric solution to Lorentz s transformation that preserves Maxwell s equations His field equations give an exact relationship between the measurements of space and time in a given region of spacetime and the energy density of that region
